Thank you verymuch for sharing. http://www.amazon.com/Practicing-German-Grammar-Martin-Durrell/dp/1444120425/ref=bxgy_cc_b_img_b is missing from your collection which actually goes with "Hammer's German Grammar and Usage"(which you already shared with us)....Hope you would upload "Practicing German Grammar"...

Thank you!

You should have used an OCR in theses files..
Some books have about ~100mb before OCR, after OCR it drops to ~10Mb[in colors, if b/w it, it drops to ~3mb]. This torrent could have less than 4Gb.

[I used this one http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4334000/ABBY_FINE_READER_final_activated100__by_ViKi_S ]

It's easy and will be easier to share the files.
